Shai Hills bụ ógbè dị nso na isi obodo Dodowa na Mpaghara odịda anyanwụ Dangme  nke Greater Accra Region nke Ghana, n'ebe ugwu Accra

Shai bụ ala dị larịị site na ọdịdị ala mana o nwere ugwu ugwu. Ugwu ndị dị n'ógbè Shai bụ isi nke ọtụtụ ebe a na-egwupụta nkume. Ahịhịa ya bụ ngwakọta nke ahịhịa na-emeghe na nke osisi, na anụmanụ ndị a hụrụ n'ebe ahụ gụnyere nnụnụ guinea, antelopes, baboons na francolins.
